Getting Started:
----------------
o Read the manual.
o Play the scene Assets/Scene Streamer/Example/Start.
  (You must add Scene 1 - Scene 6 to your build settings first.)
o Add Assets/Scene Streamer/Prefabs/Scene Streamer to your
  startup scene and customize it.
